content: imelda is a sweet simple pullover for kids knit in wizard cozy and colorful wizard brings extra fun to imelda adding its ever-changing colors to this seamless top-down sweater let a special kid choose their favorite color of wizard and make them a truly one-of-a-kind sweater that will keep tham warm all winter **sizes** 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 years **finished measurements** chest 24 26¼ 28 2¾ 32 34¼ 36 / 61 66 5 71 75 5 81 5 87 91 5 cm length measured down center back 12½ 13½ 14½ 16 17½ 19 20½ / 31 5 34 5 37 40 5 44 5 48 5 52 cm shown in size 10 yrs recommended ease approximately 2 4 / 5 10 cm positive ease **yarn** berroco wizard 100 g 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 balls #2933 apatite **needles** 24 / 80 cm circular needles sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm *or size to obtain gauge* 16 / 40 cm circular needles sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm 1 set each double-pointed needles sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle waste yarn to hold stitches **gauge** 18 sts and 26 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in st st on larger needle *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
